input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Trouser'
  - Name='Men Bonobos Pants Bonobos Stretch Washed Chinos'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Primo Chino Slim Check'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Straight Fit Smart 360 Tech Ultimate Chino Pants'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Go ActiveFlex Chino Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Momentum Golf Five Pocket Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Skinny-Fit Pants in Warpstreme'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Surplus Shorts'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Five-Pocket Tech Pants'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Big & Tall Easy Stretch Pleated Pants'
  - Name='Men's Slim Summerweight Chino'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Stretch Washed Chino 2.0 Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Stretch 5 Pocket Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Stretch Slim Shorts'
  - Name='Rhone Commuter Flyweight Five Pocket Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Performance Chino Pants'
  - Name='Men's Ministry Of Supply Kinetic Pant'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Stretch Cotton Versatwill Trousers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 34L Smooth Twill Trousers'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Primo Chino Slim Mushroom Twill'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Lived In Chino Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Performance Chino'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Weekend Performance Chino'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Transit Chino'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Performance Traveler Chino'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Trouser
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar slim-fit trouser style and intended for men, but typically uses technical fabrics aimed at performance rather than traditional cotton chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men Bonobos Pants Bonobos Stretch Washed Chinos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A stretch washed chino closely matches the fabric, fit, and casual style of the reference military-inspired chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Primo Chino Slim Check
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A slim chino with a classic style, very similar function and silhouette, though pattern detail implies a design variation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Straight Fit Smart 360 Tech Ultimate Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit performance chinos with modern fabric tech, similar in use and basic design though with tech enhancements.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Go ActiveFlex Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: ActiveFlex chinos emphasize stretch and activity comfort but maintain chino construction and casual style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Momentum Golf Five Pocket Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Golf pants designed for mobility and performance; while having chino-like pockets, they have a specialized function distinct from classic chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Skinny-Fit Pants in Warpstreme
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Skinny fit technical pants designed for mobility share silhouette elements but differ in fabric and intended use from traditional chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Surplus Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts rather than pants; made of organic cotton like reference but fundamentally different silhouette and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Five-Pocket Tech Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit, five-pocket pants with technical fabric, similar styling cues though with modern material focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Big & Tall Easy Stretch Pleated Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pleated, stretch pants offering comfort, somewhat heavier or looser fit, less aligned with the tailored straight slim chino style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Slim Summerweight Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim, summerweight chino fits the description well in cut and fabric style, closely matching the reference productâ€™s core use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Stretch Washed Chino 2.0 Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An updated stretch chino that closely parallels fit, finish, and style of the foundation chino described.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Stretch 5 Pocket Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit pants with stretch and five-pocket chino design, very close in intended use and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Stretch Slim Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts of slim chino style and stretch fabric, but different silhouette and seasonal use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Commuter Flyweight Five Pocket Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight commuters styled as five pocket pants, similar in function but lighter and more technical materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Performance Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance chinos emphasizing fabric tech but maintaining classic chino silhouette and fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Ministry Of Supply Kinetic Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical active pants with different fabric focus and fit; less emphasis on traditional chino styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Stretch Cotton Versatwill Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit stretch cotton trousers somewhat similar to chinos in fabric and fit but slightly more formal styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 34L Smooth Twill Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit twill trousers with chino-like fabric and silhouette, though smoother and more formal.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Primo Chino Slim Mushroom Twill
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A slim chino in twill fabric akin to the reference productâ€™s organic cotton chino, matching fit, fabric weight, and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Lived In Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Soft, lived-in feel chinos with similar fit and purpose to the reference vintage-style chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Performance Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance chinos made with modern fabric technology yet maintaining classic chino design and fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Weekend Performance Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual performance chinos made for everyday wear similar to the versatile reference chino.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Transit Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Transit chino balances casual style and travel functionality; while similar in silhouette, it is more travel oriented.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Performance Traveler Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traveler chino with performance features; closely related to traditional chinos but more focused on travel comfort.
